verbs.description: roundup weed killer [V: may] play role in widespread bee deaths study finds for the past decade bee colonies have been dying off in high numbers and a new study suggests the widely used herbicide may be a factor proceedings of university of texas at austin united states bayer erick motta university of texas roundup graduate student snodgrassella alvi national academy of sciences professor nancy moran monsanto austin texas glyphosate austin
